name: Tab Tree for FT Deepdark
description:
Clean dark version of the famous Tree Tab add-on.

Tired of always scrolling through hundreds of tabs?
Get more visibility on all your opened tabs, as well as other useful features that will make your experience much smoother!

Theme by n0x (nox). Style based on TabTree for Gnome.
additional_info: Download Tab Tree on mozilla.org -- Get more userstyles from me! --

discussions.name: Based on Tab Tree for GNOME?
